concept.title: Shared Mandatory Fields with Default Values

conbody.p: The configuration utility provides default values for all of these fields./options. If you do not change the default value, you do not need to specify these fields on the command line. Note that SenSage AP requires that resources are placed in consistent locations across all servers.

plentry.pd: Specifies the valid path on all machines for the directory containing GNU utilities (including tar and gunzip).
Specifies the valid path on all machines for the directory that contains a usable Java JDK.
Specifies the valid path on all machines for the directory containing the rsync program.
Specifies the valid path on all machines for the directory containing the openssl program.
Specifies the valid path on all machines for the directory containing the ssh programs.
